The Health and Environment Committee will meet on January 22, 2020 at 2:30 PM to discuss the
recommendation from the Urban Forest Master Plan Taskforce and outline potential amendment
to the Tree Protection Ordinance, including an extension of the current moratorium.
1.

TPO Extension PO

RESULT:
REFERRED

Next: 1/27/2020 5:30 PM

2.

A Report was received from the Department of Public Works entitled Cambridge Urban Forest
Master Plan, Nov 12, 2019.

3.

A communication was received from Florrie Wescoat on behalf of the Cambridge Committee on
Public Planting, regarding comments on UFMP Technical Report.

RESULT:
4.

A communication was received from Steven Nutter on behalf of Green Cambridge regarding support
for tree protection extension.

RESULT:
5.

PLACED ON FILE

A communication was received from Elisabeth Werby, 7 Wright Street, regarding trees matter and
support for extending the moratorium.

PLACED ON FILE

A communication was received from Helen Snively, 1 Fayette Park, regarding Tree canopy
protection...please extend it.

RESULT:
6.

A communication was received from Carol O'Hare, 172 Magazine Street, regarding extend tree
protection moratorium.
